Detailed Description

Reads complex amplitude time samples from a file and plots the data as freq vs time vs power.

Definition at line 67 of file WaterfallDisplay.java.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

opensonata.dataDisplays.WaterfallDisplay.WaterfallDisplay ( boolean  usingGui,
JFrame  mainGuiFrame,
String  inFilename,
String  outFilename,
int  subbandOffset,
int  width,
int  height,
float  pixelScaleFactor,
float  pixelOffsetFactor,
int  resolutionHz,
boolean  slowPlay,
boolean  repeatPlay,
String  title 
)

Constructor.

Parameters:
usingGui true if using GUI, false if not.
mainGuiFrame the JFrame containing the GUI.
inFilename the input data file name.
outFilename the output data file name.
subbandOffset the subband offset.
width the width if the waterfall image window.
height the hieght if the waterfall image window.
pixelScaleFactor the waterfall image scale.
pixelOffsetFactor the waterfall image offset.
resolutionHz the resolution in Hz (1, 2 or 4)
slowPlay if true display the data slowly to approximate the speed of the real time system.
repeatPlay if true repeat over and over.
title the title to display at the top of the frame.
